if someone knew, they would tell you
if you're very lucky, you can fix this with a rescue function from a Windows boot disk. This isn't the best forum to ask about that, though
lemonsCC's instructions won't work for you
because you didn't overwrite your MBR, you overwrote your hda1 boot sector.
what I told you before. Recover with a Windows boot CD
you could try the utility testdisk
I have never used this, though, and won't be able to help
then your partition is borked and you'll have to reinstall Windows.
I can't see a way. You could still ask for help in ##windows
